creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
description: A woman standing under a tree. She is wearing a straw hat and is holding a fan
inscription:
poem(senryu_?)
A beautiful woman
Is more attractive
If she is
Seduced by her desire
(Utsukushii
Ue nimo yoku wo
Tashinami te)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Woman with a hat walking under a tree
